cells.data: You can use the following code added to elements on your site to track user journeys. You will need Universal Analytics code not the classic implementation for it to work.

The important things to note here are the category ‘Book a Course’ and Action ‘Sidebar click’. If you use the same category for the stages of a process they will collect in Analytics together. The full options are below.
You can attach a value to your event which is great if you are using ecomm but also as a way of quantifying the importance of the actions going on the site.
